text.小さい子の声につい反応してしまう: They tend to react to the \nsound of little \nchildren's voices.
text.祭りばやしの音を聞くと、踊るように動く:
When they hear the sound 
of festival music, they 
move as if they were 
performing a dance.
text.新しいいたずらを思いつくとぴこぴこする: They ping back and forth \nwhen she thinks of a new \nprank
text.知らない単語はすべて呪文に聞こえる: Every word she doesn't \nknow sounds like an \nincantation.
text.物語の山場になるとピンと反り返る: When the story reaches \nits climax, it flicks and \nturns everywhere.
text.帽子の耳用の穴は、自分で切って縫った: She added the ear-holes \nin her beanie herself.
text.さわると安心感に包まれ、癒されると評判: They have a reputation \nfor being healing and \ncomforting when touched.
text.ハチマキを外すと垂れる: They droop down when her \nbeanie is taken off.
text.足で耳に触ることができる: Can touch her ears with her feet
text.男性の声を聞くと固まってしまう: She freezes up when she \nhears men's voices.
text.ネーチャンと聞くとつい反応してしまう: They tend to react when \nshe hears the word \n"nee-chan".
text.一流にふさわしい話題以外耳に入れたくない:
They don't want to hear 
anything other than 
topics adequate for the 
first-class.
text.風向きと風の強さを感知できる: They can sense wind \ndirection and wind \nstrength.
text.追い詰められるほど、嬉しそうにピクつく: Twitch ever more happily \nthe more she's ran down
text.音感に優れている: She has an excellent \nsense of sound.
text.いい格言が思い浮かぶとピクンと震える: When she thinks of a good \nproverb, her ears tingle.
text.ガラスの割れる音がすると耳を伏せてしまう: The sound of breaking \nglass makes her ears tilt \ndownwards.
text.可愛い声を聞くとほんのり赤くなる: She blushes a little when \nshe hears a pretty voice.
text.耳かきされると、すぐ眠ってしまう: Falls asleep easily while \ngetting her ears cleaned.
text.ラッパの音が聞こえるとピンと背筋が伸びる: Stand up when hearing \nthe sound of a horn
text.自分と似た耳のウマ娘は目で追ってしまう: Twitch ever more happily the \nfurther she's cornered
text.俺を謳うは俺――（※取材陣を無視しがち）: I sing my own pra―― \n(※Tends to ignore the press)
text.音楽が聞こえると耳を澄ますこともある: Can stand straight and attentive \nwhen listening to music
text.イヤリングをよくなくし、今ので9代目: Often loses earrings, \nthis is her 9th set
text.両耳のカバーはパパの手作り: Both of her ear covers \nwere handmade by her dad.
text.メンコは絶対つけ忘れない: Never forgets to wear \nher ear covers
text.ゴングの音に反応してしまう: Always respond to the \nsound of a gong
text.“シグナル”受信に最適なパラボラ形状: Have the optimal parabola shape \nfor picking up "signals"
text.寝起きから、ピンと立つまで時間がかかる: Take a while to point up straight \nafter sleeping.
